original_title: Matale District final results: NPP wins 4 seats, SJB gets one
original_body_lines: The Election Commission of Sri Lanka has released the final results of the Matale District in the 2024 General Election with the National People’s Power (NPP) polling more than 66% of the total votes in the district.
NPP has polled 181,678 votes to win the district while the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) is second with 53,200 votes (19.37%).
Accordingly, the NPP has secured 4 seats in the district while the SJB has won one seat in the district.
